body.name: Farberware Countertop Microwave 700 Watts, 0.7 Cu. Ft. - Microwave Oven With LED Lighting and Child Lock - Perfect for Apartments and Dorms - Easy Clean Stainless Steel
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 8 hrs 17 mins
FREE delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 7 hrs 17 mins
features: CONVENIENT MICROWAVE: Prepare quick and easy meals in a snap with our powerful microwave. It packs 700 of output power and features a range of settings for press-and-go speed.

POWERFUL SETTINGS: This microwave has ten power levels with multi-stage cooking. You can fully customize your cooking with six one-touch options, including popcorn, potato, and pizza. Defrost by weight or by time settings to make quick work of any task.

PERFECT SIZE: Measuring 0.7 cu ft, this microwave is the ideal small-space solution that offers full-sized cooking in a compact space. It features an easy-to-clean interior and exterior and is perfect for the home or office.

ALL YOU NEED: This microwave has a clear LED display with a kitchen timer and clock that lets you easily keep track of time. Easy-to-view interior lighting lets you keep an eye on your dish, and a child safety lock adds additional security.
FARBERWARE: From weeknight favorites to family feasts they'll never forget, Farberware helps today's families craft the meals that make memories and bring everyone together.
body.description: This microwave oven is the ideal size for office break rooms or home kitchens. One-touch cooking programs let you cook six of the most popular food items with the touch of a button. Choose from ten power levels up to 700. The large digital screen has a clock feature and can display a countdown timer in addition to the remaining cook time. The memory function lets you customize and save your favorite settings, and the large door has an easy-grip handle and child-safety lock.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Weight/Time Defrost Defrost all of your frozen foods! Defrost by time or weight to speed along your cooking endeavors. One-touch Cooking Programs Choose from 6 auto cooking programs (popcorn, potato, pizza, frozen vegetable, dinner plate, beverage). Cook or reheat your favorite dishes with one convenient button. Safety Lock Feature Easily lock to eliminate unsupervised use and keep children safe. Express Cooking Cook your meals & leftovers with just a touch of a button by touching the number pad (1 through 6 minutes).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awsome little Microwave
reviews.reviewText: Nice little microwave for a small space. Works great and is easy to use. Build and finish is great. If you need a small microwave this is the one to get.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for my ice house!
reviews.reviewText: small space available inside of the ice house and this compact unit fits perfectly! It has a low power draw so i can run it off the generator without a problem and it does what a microwave is supposed to do. Seems to have good, consistent heating and isn't too loud- although i wouldn't call it ultra quiet compared to a regular size residential unit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Turntable Issues - See Review - Recommended Buy
reviews.reviewText: DATE OF ORDER: 01/25/2022DATE RECEIVED: Do Not RecallDATE OF REVIEW: 02/03/24PERSONAL BUY or PRODUCT FOR REVIEW: Personal purchase.DELIVERY: Delivered by UPS or FedEx at the time.QUALITY: Easy to use controls. GREAT for a small space. Nice Black finish. Digital controls. Seems well built. Turntable issues.INTENDED PURPOSE: Kitchen MicrowaveRECOMMENDATION: We bought this microwave on 01/25/2022 from Amazon. I thought we wrote a review at that time and had intended on updating now that its been in use for a couple of years but Amazon will only go back into 2023. So, here it is (updated)...The microwave is excellent for the small space we have. The buttons all work without having to apply a lot of pressure to the buttons. There is ONE complaint though... The plate that sits on the turntable is sooooooo easy to knock off. It doesn't sit on the rollers or center rotator very well. The stubs on the bottom of the plate are so short they have a hard time grabbing. Care must be exercised to keep it on. We've had plenty of other microwaves in the past. This one has to be the worst for keeping the table on track. Its not easy to get back on. There is a lot of fumbling in the process. It can be aggravating at times. But the overall performance of the microwave is that it still works and performs as its expected for a little microwave. It will take a little longer (seconds seem like hours) than larger units with higher wattage outputs. We would buy this unit again but we would first look to see if there is a different design or manufacturer that has a better turntable design. For the price point, this is a good buy and has served us well for 2 years now. We would still make a recommendation to buy. Just keep in mind the turntable issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Worked fine from the start. Really like the dark interior finish -- does not stain and wipes clean with ease.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit & works great!
reviews.reviewText: I down sized,for more room on counter. My other one was old & it was time to replace anyway. We like it. Still holds a lot of food to warm up. Always using it for hot beverages. Grest purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars MY COLLEGE SON LOVED THIS
reviews.reviewText: My son is in college, and his old microwave just imploded or something. It was disgusting. So, I needed a quick fix. As an Engineering student, he sometimes has to study so hard that it's no time for the cafeteria, so we make sure to keep his mini fridge and cabinets stocked. This microwave was smaller than his previous one, but he's an R.A., and has a room all to himself. He loves that the interior is black as well. He loved the ease of the settings. Great for a single person or couple who have no children, a bachelor or bachelorette, or student. Well worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: 700 watt, 0.7 cuft. Farberware microwave oven.This unit replaced an Insignia of the same size/dimensions. I could have replaced that unit with the exact same microwave oven (and $20 less expensive) but didn't because it only lasted 2 1/2 years when the power cord caught fire behind the metal back plate.So...... I decided on this Farberware unit thinking it would live up to it's reputation/name recognition. How wrong I was:1) After 4-5 uses, a few minutes each, the oven started making intermittent crunchy noises. Not inspiring confidence!2) Whoever designed this thing needs to go back to school: the interior is soooo tiny with "nooks and crannies", "bumps and lumps" everywhere that won't allow me to put anything but a coffee cup, a very small bowl or at most, a dinner plate in it.3) The touch pad feels very "flat" and is not very responsive. I have to put my fingers "just so" for it to respond. My prediction is that it won't take long before it quits altogether. Also not inspiring confidence!Remember my Insignia?.............it would fit my Tupperware Microwave Pressure Cooker. Not this one, it doesn't even fit through the door!!!!I never cook in my microwave but would like to be able to fit a halfway decent size bowl, casserole, or my pressure cooker in it!All this makes this oven completely useless in a average houshold, a household that doesn't demand that much of it's microwave. AND.....my $170.- TW Pressure Cooker is now obsolete.And, of course, return date elapsed TODAY.In short: very disappointed, never again!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Microwave don’t last long
reviews.reviewText: This little microwave is perfect for the spot I had for it and ran pretty good at first, but it is holding a lot of moist and the smell of food which I am realizing rust in the corners. Maybe I need to buy a specific product to clean the microwave I don’t know if this is supposed to happening.
I needed a replacement for my small microwave, and this one is perfect. Smaller than I measured using the listed dimensions, which is great.

Au delà de mes attentes, dans certains commentaires il était mentionné que le micro-ondes était trop léger et que ça prenait les deux mains pour ouvrir la porte ...ce n'est pas du tout le cas pour moi il est très stable et très efficace et le "look" est super..

reviews.reviewTitle: If I could've given this a 10rating, I would have
reviews.reviewText: Quick cook 1-6 minute option. 30 seconds is available too..Blue display is eye appealing.Most of the models that when you pull the door open you have to hold it in place to brace it from sliding forward when you pull the door open. This one opens easy without having to do that.Inside cooking space is more than adequate...It's an attractive appearance and the display is easy to see.The one thing is that you need to press time-cook before entering the cooking time if you don't use quick cook...
Works Great! Love the grey interior - doesn't the messes that well. Good thing or bad thing?
